item.description:
WHEN: Sunday, May 25, 2008 at 7:00 PM
WHERE: The Grog
13 Middle St.
Newburyport , MA 01950
978-465-8008


Sunday Nights are : PARKER WHEELER'S BLUES PARTY @ THE GROG!

This is always a LOAD of fun!!! The music and dancing are always good! People dance free-style alone or together.. makes no difference.Always a great time! Tonight's feature artists are:
Thom Enright, Marty Ballou, Marty Richards, and Andee Castenell.

Cover Charge: $7.00

The "Party" gets started @ 7pm and winds down at 11:00.
Since this is Memorial weekend, it should be very well attended.
I know I'll be there! not having to get up on a Monday am

* NOTE: This event jhas been cross posted with other meetup- groups. If you want to go and need to carpool? add it to your RSVP. We may be meeting up at the outside entrance. There may be an earlier event in the area that same day? not sure at this writing... SO, PLEASE CHECK BACK FOR AN UPDATE.

_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting outside at the front entrance. If you miss the group? not to worry... we will be downstairs. Look for the meetup table sign.
item.why: Parker Wheeler's Blues Party is always a good time! It's Memorial wknd... How often can you be out late on a Sunday evening? and not have to get up to go to work on a Monday am?
item.name: PARKER WHEELER'S BLUES PARTY @ The Grog
